_sText:
Well, i made this map for my server but because it is so musch fun i decided to upload it. This map is small, with only 8 spawn points per side, and was made with fast action in mind. The tipical match lasts less than 30 seconts, depending on how aggressive the players are. 

AT A GLANCE
16 spawn points total
skybox
animated sky
underground passage
hidden goodies

EDIT
Due to SPAWN KILLING n00b, Ivan, i have added metal covers over the windows that break with 1 shot. All this does is prevents a AWPer from finding his target before the game starts. If you played this map on my server, that is about the only thing i have changed, that and i toned down the strength of the underground blockers and added a arrow to help the n00bs find it. LOL

<b><font size="4"><font color="yellow">Final version avaliable, http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/49696</font>
